greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = n mod (sum of digits of n).
comment: a(A138791(n)) = n and a(m) <> n for m < A138791(n). [_Reinhard Zumkeller_, Nov 07 2011]
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
maple: P:=proc(n) local i,k,w; for i from 1 by 1 to n do w:=0; k:=i; while k>0 do w:=w+k-trunc(k/10)*10; k:=trunc(k/10); od; print(i mod w); od; end: P(1000); # _Paolo P. Lava_, Feb 06 2007
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, May 13 2002
